subject: [Ip-health] 2-page brief on IP and EPAs
body:
This is a multi-part message in MIME format.
--
[ Picked text/plain from multipart/alternative ]
Dear all



CIEL has published a 2-page policy brief on "The Problem of Intellectual
Property in Economic Partnership Agreements with the African, Caribbean and
Pacific Countries", available at
http://www.ciel.org/Publications/EPA_Synthesis_4June07.pdf. This is a
shorter and updated version of a piece that originally appeared in the South
Centre/CIEL IP Quarterly (Fourth Quarter 2006) and in the CIEL Discussion
Paper "The European Approach to Intellectual Property in European
Partnership Agreements with the African, Caribbean And Pacific Group Of
Countries" available at
http://www.ciel.org/Publications/EU_EPAs_Draft_18Apr07.pdf. Please feel free
to use, distribute and share widely.



Dalindyebo Shabalala

Director, Intellectual Property and Sustainable Development Project

Center for International Environmental Law

15 Rue des Savoises

1205 Geneva

Switzerland

Phone: +41 22 321 4774

Fax: +41 22 789 0739



--
